title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 474.3 - Form to be executed upon purchase
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 474.3 - Form to be executed upon purchase

State Regulations
(a) Before delivering a self-defense spray
device to any person, the seller shall require proof of age and a sworn
statement on a form as described in section
474.5
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
474.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
